select: SELECT * FROM SEARCH_BOARD_VIEW SBV JOIN ( Select ARTICLE_NUM FROM ARTICLE_SEARCH_VIEW WHERE SR_TRANSACTION_TYPE_ID LIKE ? + AND calc_distance(LATITUDE,LONGITUDE,?,?)<= ? + AND STORAGE_PERIOD_TYPE_ID LIKE ? + AND PET_FLAG LIKE ? + AND SECURITY_FACILITY_ID LIKE ? + AND STORAGE_TYPE LIKE ? + AND CATEGORY_ID LIKE ? + )SB + USING (ARTICLE_NUM);
